t: Ord. No. 2007-03. AN ORDINANCE OF THE CITY OF AMERICAN CANYON, CALIFORNIA, AMENDING CHAPTER 2 OF THE CITY OF AMERICAN CANYON MUNICIPAL CODE TO GRANT TO THE CITY MANAGER THE AUTHORITY TO APPOINT, REMOVE, PROMOTE, AND DEMOTE THE CITY CLERK AND CITY TREASURER.
